h3_title: Best Black Myth Wukong Gourd Drinks
content: Below you can find a full list of the Drinks in the game and where they can be found. Additionally, you can check each one off as you find them. Each link will take you to a dedicated page for each Drink, or you can use our walkthrough.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drinks.md', within the main section titled 'Drinks', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Drinks Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Best Black Myth Wukong Gourd Drinks'.
The content is as follows:
Below you can find a full list of the Drinks in the game and where they can be found. Additionally, you can check each one off as you find them. Each link will take you to a dedicated page for each Drink, or you can use our walkthrough.
